title: Fruit burst

title: Mogo
description: Built a scalable online food delivery platform with Angular for the frontend and Express.js for the backend. Features include real-time order tracking and payment integration.

title: Dragon News
description: Implemented an AI-powered chatbot using TensorFlow and Python. The chatbot incorporates natural language processing (NLP) and deep learning algorithms for advanced conversational capabilities.

title: Summer Sale

description: Designed and developed a sleek portfolio website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. The website showcases projects, skills, and contact information in an interactive manner.

title: Career Maker

title: Flower Shop
description: Developed a healthcare app using React Native and Firebase. Features include appointment scheduling, health tracking, and secure user data storage.

title: Course Registration
description: Created a real estate management system with Angular for the frontend, Node.js for the backend, and MySQL for database management. Supports property listings and user profiles.
